t2: Green Wind Energy develops wind power projects on-site in, and for the region. We are the people to contact regarding the consolidation of existing farms, repowering and also new-developments with cooperation partners. Here you can see one of Germany´s biggest repowering projects of 2017 and other model projects in Brandenburg.

subsections.title: Project Vormark/Prignitz (Groß Pankow)
subsections.text:
In late 2016, Green Wind Energy removed 14 old installations at wind-suitable sites and replaced them with 14 new windpower plants. They were put into operation in the first quarter of 2017, including a connecting substation in Kuhsdorf.

Rated power 48.3 megawatts 

The construction of the new wind power plant with an axle-shaft height of 449.48 feet (137 m) and a rated power of 3,450 kilowatts (previously 1,500 kilowatts) took place within three months. 21 megawatts rated power were turned into 48.3 megawatts. Repowering increased the energy yield four-fold.. The wind farm is equipped with appropriate night identification.

Compensatory measures

Upon request of the municipality, as compensatory measures, buildings which were no longer required were demolished trees were planted and a traditional orchard was laid. Sand lizards were relocated to surrogate habitats. Bats received new nest boxes in three spots and nests were also placed for barn swallows.

Project partner: European Energy
Technical operating management: Green Wind Operations

subsections.title: Project Neustadt (Dosse)
subsections.text:
Approval planning for operator e.disnatur, Potsdam

Site location: Neustadt (Dosse), Brandenburg

Old installations: 3 x Südwind S 46, rated power 2 x 600 kW/1 x 750 kW, axle-shaft height 2 x 97 m/1 x 83 m

New installations: 2 x Vestas V 112, rated power 3.300 kW, axle-shaft height140 m

Approval: May 2016

Commissioned by Vestas: 2017

subsections.title: Project Timpberg
subsections.text:
Site location: Zehdenick, Prignitz-Oberhavel, Brandenburg
Old installations: 2 x VESTAS V80, 4 MW power, 78 m hub height
Commissioned 2002
Dismantled: 08/2015
New installations: 2 x VESTAS V112, 6 MW power, 125 m hub height
Commissioned 12/2015 
Best: profitable exit for the owner of the old wind power plants, attractive project for the new operator, continued support by the general public, Green Wind Energy as the general contractor

subsections.title: Project Kuhsdorf
subsections.text:
First enhancement of the Prignitz wind-farm
Site location: Groß Pankow, Prignitz-Oberhavel, Brandenburg
Installation: 2 x VESTAS V80, 4 MW power, 78 m hub height
Commissioned: 2011 first part of the multiphase new planning of the entire wind-farm, see above
Best: strong private and public support, Green Wind Energy as the general contractor

subsections.title: Project Klein-Mutz
subsections.text:
Site location: Zehdenick, Prignitz-Oberhavel, Brandenburg
Installation: 4 x VESTAS V90, 8 MW power, 125 m hub height
Commissioned: 12/2012

Project partner: Saxovent, Notus
Best: constructive collaboration, short project duration for approval and implementation
